abstract: Kenneth C. Griffin, the founder of Citadel, has had troubles with his investment bank division from its beginning in 2008 and is now seeking to sell it.
snippet: Kenneth C. Griffin, the founder of Citadel, has had troubles with his investment bank division from its beginning in 2008 and is now seeking to sell it.
lead_paragraph: It was to have been the summit of a spectacularly ambitious and rapid ascent in finance: turning what began as a $4.6 million hedge fund into an investment bank that could rival Goldman Sachs.

headline.main: Citadel Chief Gives Up Dream for Investment Bank

byline.original: By Azam Ahmed and Susanne Craig
